TopicTitle: KSP GU Mass transfer 7 not loading i guess?

Articles.Content: so ive just installed GU and its loading fine but until it gets to mass transfer 7 where it crashes my ksp. Please help:/

What is "mass transfer 7"?

Are you starting KSP, then it crashes and closes before you ever reach the menu? Does it just quietly close to the desktop, or do you get a small Unity error window for a few seconds?

Did you install all the GU dependencies, picking versions of those mods that are compatible with GU and your KSP version? (I haven't used GU but I many planet packs need Scatterer v0.77xx not v0.8xx).

Please share your log files. That will reveal a lot of information including what mods you use, KSP version, operating system, and mod error messages. Directions in link below:

Yes so i managed to figure out that whole ordeal but i have a new problem where it finishes loading and then just crashes. I'm using only GU and its dependencies, I've joined the GU discord and asked the owner for help and he doesn't seem to know what to do. I've shown logs, folders etc but still nothing.
